0.2.0.en: Added support for Home Assistant Switches and Binary Sensors.

0.2.1.en: Fixes Door, Occupancy and Openings alarm types.

0.3.0.en: Added support for Home Assistant media_player entities. Fixed support for sensor and binary_sensor custom values. Fixed switching between light color modes.

0.3.1.en: Updated default icons for device classes.

0.4.0.en: Added support for Home Assistant devices with Cover entities.

0.5.0.en: Swap default port on protocol change

0.6.0.en: Added support for Fan and Vacuum devices, fixes an issue with missing flowcards and update Home Assistant logo.

0.6.1.en: Fixed migration of switch device capablities.

0.6.2.en: Fixes issues with migration of capabilities.
